channel.title: Shop Currency/Using different Currency. Pk Points
channel.description:
Well, i need a shop so you can buy stuff from there, But only with your PK points.
Iv'e made a mini-game, it gives you pk points when you kill someone. But you dont loose your stuff. Takes you back to waiting room. And the winner gets 10 points + how many they kill, The rest get how many they kill.
Anyways i want it so that you can buy and sell stuff for PK points. Can anybody help?

item.title: Shop Currency/Using different Currency. Pk Points
item.dc:creator: @pure_pkr_greg pure pkr greg
item.description:
@pure_pkr_greg wrote:

make a copy of your client.java then try it yourself and if u mess up put your copied client.java back in

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor( GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = GetItemSlot(****); if (Slot == -1) { itzscape("You don't have enough ****."); break;

i think he wants u to change those first starts to the item number of what u want shop to be and the 2nd starts to be what there called plural - tokens<-

Read full topic

            for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
                TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(
                        GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
                Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
                if (Slot == -1) {
                    itzscape("You don't have enough coins.");
                    break;

under public void buyitems

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Find where it calls for the gp for shops and make an exception for one of the shops. then make sure the shop’s ids and everything are right you can also make it so it won’t show the other items unless they have so many p points.
